---
name: Bug Report (Website)
about: Report an issue with our web platforms
title: ''
labels: Bug, Website
assignees: my3t

---

## Scope

**Steam ID or Profile**
To reward you with the bounty if this is solved.

**Url**
What page of the website is this bug occurring on?
e.g. https://titan.tf/inventory

**Desktop**
 - OS: [e.g. iOS]
 - Browser [e.g. chrome, safari]
 - Version [e.g. 22]

**Smartphone**
 - Device: [e.g. iPhone6]
 - OS: [e.g. iOS8.1]
 - Browser [e.g. stock browser, safari]
 - Version [e.g. 22]

## Details

**Describe**
A clear and concise description of what the bug is.

**To Reproduce**
The steps required to reproduce the behavior:
1. Go to '...'
2. Click on '....'
3. Scroll down to '....'
4. See error

**Expected Behavior**
A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.

**Screenshots**
If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem.

**Additional Context**
Add any other context about the problem here.
